body_html: Assigning to RNN API people -- I suspect they are going to push back on these changes without a very compelling reason. In general, our base libraries should strive to be simple and this seems to be trying to do a little too much. But we'll see what they say.
body_text: Assigning to RNN API people -- I suspect they are going to push back on these changes without a very compelling reason.  In general, our base libraries should strive to be simple and this seems to be trying to do a little too much.  But we'll see what they say.
body: Assigning to RNN API people -- I suspect they are going to push back on these changes without a very compelling reason.  In general, our base libraries should strive to be simple and this seems to be trying to do a little too much.  But we'll see what they say.
